gymTracker.title: Gym Tracker (AppGYM)
gymTracker.description: Gym Tracker (AppGYM) is a PWA that tracks nutrition, workouts, and body metrics to calculate energy balance and body composition progress. It also uses AI to analyze habits and provide personalized recommendations to improve performance and composition.

aiAccountingPortal.title: AI Accounting Portal + ERP
aiAccountingPortal.description: This portal automates accounting with AI to extract invoice data and validate it directly against an ERP system. It streamlines real-time control of suppliers and documents, ensuring data integrity through bulk synchronization workflows. It supports human supervision and manual correction before final data export to the management system.

aiStoreChat.title: AI Store Chat Assistant
aiStoreChat.description: It is an AI chat integrated into the store that automates orders from natural-language prompts and also acts as a product search engine. It interprets user intent and generates interactive responses, including product lists and item selection. It supports text interaction and file processing (TXT and CSV) to structure orders automatically.
